examples.text: Kahramanmaraş ve Gaziantep depremleri orada yaşayan neredeyse herkesi evsiz barksız bırakmıştı.
examples.translation: Earthquakes happened in Kahramanmaraş and Gaziantep made almost everyone homeless who lived at there.

etymology: Literally combination of two words of same meaning: evsiz (“homeless”) + barksız (“homeless”).
